Articles.Content: The title basically. I remember there was atleast rover wheel sound mods at one point. I see there is one for 1.5. But what about tracks and or dust? I swear I was watching a video of a rover kicking it up.
Most likely videos of Apollo 15, 16, and 17. In all my years with KSP, I've never seen tracks or dust plumes in the game.

CollisionFX used to have some sort of wheels kicking up dust, pizzaoverhead also made a mod for rover wheel sounds, and I think KopernicusExpansion did rover tracks.

Man, I miss pizzaoverhead.
